attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app because I was sick and tired of having fake mainstream media give me fake news left and right! I felt like I could no longer trust anyone, not even my own family, with news and updates. So I gave this app a try and 😱😱😱 the horror that I came across. I could not believe it! This app tries feeding me EVEN MORE LIES than I already came across on YouTube, Facebook, and twitter. Everywhere I look is lies! I don’t have anyone left to trust, my husband left me, my children don’t talk to me, my mother and father won’t even look at my face anymore. I felt so blind sighted and thought this app would be my saving grace, but I guess I’m going to have to cut out all news sources altogether. I vow to live out in the country away from everyone and never speak to another soul again. Can’t trust nobody.

attributes.title: I hate it
attributes.review: This is the WORST app I ever download.I don’t recommend you downloading this app,however I do recommend you leaving a bad review that will help us all out!!I don’t ever want to see this on the AppStore ever again.Thank you for your time and make sure to NOT vote for a Trump;)
